name: Name
not_found_message: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist.
first_name_error: The name must have at least 2 characters.
last_name_error: The last name must have at least 2 characters.
email_error: Please enter a valid email address.
password_error: The password must be at least 6 characters.
confirm_delete_message: This action cannot be undone. Do you want to delete this record?
confirm_reservation_message: The reservation will be made for ticket number:
email_sent: Email sent, please check your inbox and/or spam folder.
welcome_to_tool: We're happy to see you here. Explore the features and start managing your raffles.
intro_to_coney: Coney is a platform designed to simplify raffle management, allowing you to automate processes and save time.
signup_invitation: Sign up now to start managing your raffles and be part of our community.
thank_you_message: We're glad you've joined our platform. We hope you enjoy using Coney.
invite_to_login: You can now log in and start managing raffles.
initDate must be today or in the future: The start date must be today or in the future
No eligible tickets found: To select a winner, at least one ticket must be reserved and paid for. Currently, there are no tickets that have been successfully paid for.
not_your_riffle: Only the creator can choose the winner
login_required_message: You must log in or register to view tickets for this raffle.
unpaid_ticket: Uncancelled tickets do not participate in the draw.
raffle_description: The winning number will be randomly selected through an automated and transparent process, ensuring equal opportunities for all participants.
payment_pending_notice: If the payment is not reflected within 10 minutes, the tickets you selected will still be available.
payment_failed_message: Unfortunately, we were unable to process your purchase. You can try again later.
your_purchase_is_successful: Your tickets have been successfully reserved. We wish you the best of luck in the drawing!
creator: Creator
error_selected_winner: The winner could not be selected
search_placeholder_payment: Search by raffle name or buyer
endDate must be greater than initDate: The end date must be after the start date.
price_positive: The price must be a positive number.
ticketCount_min: You must create at least 10 tickets.
name_min: The name must have at least 6 characters.
price_min: The price must be at least 1000 pesos.
init_date_invalid: The start date is not valid
end_date_invalid: The end date is not valid
endDate_must_be_greater_than_initDate: The end date must be after the start date.
recover_password_instruction: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
error_recovering_password: The recovery email could not be sent.
create_riffle_description: Complete the raffle details to create a new raffle and invite participants.
edit_riffle_description: Edit the raffle details to update information and keep participants informed.
error_loading_data: An error occurred while loading the information.
please_upload_photo: You must upload a profile picture to continue.
confirm_winner_message: Once you select the winner, the raffle will be closed and cannot be modified.
ticket_text_required: The legal text of the ticket is mandatory.
ticket_text_invalid: The text must be a valid string.
ticket_text_min: The text must have at least 10 characters.
ticket_text_max: The text must not exceed 300 characters.
confirm_delete_document: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
prize_appraisal_pdf: Copy of commercial appraisal of the prizes
awaiting_admin_review: We're waiting for an administrator to review the documentation to continue the process.
authorization_required_message: This raffle requires authorization to be active.
rejection_reason_min: The reason must be at least 10 characters long.
authorization_info_title: These raffles are not yet authorized
authorization_info_message: You must upload all required documents so an administrator can review and approve the raffle. Until then, it will not be available to users.
